_data.title: Getting started

_data.text:
Empower your NuxtJS application with `@nuxtjs/content` module: write in a `content/` directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a **Git-based Headless CMS**.

## Writing content

Learn how to write your `content/`, supporting Markdown, YAML, CSV and JSON: https://content.nuxtjs.org/writing.

## Fetching content

Learn how to fetch your content with `$content`: https://content.nuxtjs.org/fetching.

## Displaying content

Learn how to display your Markdown content with the `<nuxt-content>` component directly in your template: https://content.nuxtjs.org/displaying.

_data.description: Empower your NuxtJS application with @nuxt/content module: write in a content/ directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a Git-based Headless CMS.
_data.title: Test covid
_data.name: Tnloc

children.value:
TTO - Sng nay 22-5, B Y t thng bo ghi nhn thm 20 ca mc COVID-19 mi. Trc , ngy 21-5, t h tr iu tr bnh nhn nng  tin hnh hi chn tm bin php iu tr 21 ca bnh nng.
Trao 700 triu ng h tr ngi lao ng bi anh hng bi COVID-19
ng Tp Cn Bnh cam kt vin tr 3 t USD gip cc nc phc hi sau dch COVID-19
Em b s sinh n  chin thng nguy kch COVID-19
20 ca mc mi (ca bnh 4942-4961) u l ca mc ghi nhn trong nc ti: Bc Giang (11), Hi Dng (4), Bc Ninh (3), Thi Bnh (1), in Bin (1).
Tnh n 6h ngy 22-5, Vit Nam c tng cng 3.482 ca ghi nhn trong nc v 1.479 ca nhp cnh. Trong  s lng ca mc mi tnh t ngy 27-4 n nay l 1.912 ca.
S lng xt nghim t ngy 29-4 n nay l 802.009, xt nghim cho 1.446.130 lt ngi.
Thng tin chi tit cc ca mc mi nh sau:
Ca bnh 4942: nam, 84 tui, a ch ti huyn Kin Xng, tnh Thi Bnh; l F1 ca BN3750,  c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2.
Ca bnh 4943-4945: l cc trng hp F1  c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 20 v 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2.
Ca bnh 4946: n, 30 tui, a ch ti huyn Nm P, tnh in Bin; l F1 ca BN3997,  c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. Hin ang c cch ly, iu tr ti Bnh vin d chin in Bin Ph.
Ca bnh 4947-495: l cc trng hp F1,  c cch ly. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 18-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2.
Ca bnh 4951-4961: gsadasdsad v 1 ca trong khu phong ta. Kt qu xt nghim dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2.

Trc , ngy 21-5, cc gio s u ngnh hi sc tch cc v truyn nhim  hi chn v 21 ca bnh c bin chuyn nng, ng ch  trong  c mt s bnh nhn di 40 tui v c c ph n ang mang thai. Ring ti Bc Ninh c trn 60 bnh nhn c triu chng.
Sng 22-5: 20 ca COVID-19 mi, cc gio s hi chn 21 ca nng - nh 1.

_data.text: TTO - Sng nay 22-5, B Y t thng bo ghi nhn thm 20 ca mc COVID-19 mi. Trc , ngy 21-5, t h tr iu tr bnh nhn nng tin hnh hi chn tm bin php iu tr 21 ca bnh nng. Trao 700 triu ng h tr ngi lao ng bi anh hng bi COVID-19 ng Tp Cn Bnh cam kt vin tr 3 t USD gip cc nc phc hi sau dch COVID-19 Em b s sinh n chin thng nguy kch COVID-19 20 ca mc mi (ca bnh 4942-4961) u l ca mc ghi nhn trong nc ti: Bc Giang (11), Hi Dng (4), Bc Ninh (3), Thi Bnh (1), in Bin (1). Tnh n 6h ngy 22-5, Vit Nam c tng cng 3.482 ca ghi nhn trong nc v 1.479 ca nhp cnh. Trong s lng ca mc mi tnh t ngy 27-4 n nay l 1.912 ca. S lng xt nghim t ngy 29-4 n nay l 802.009, xt nghim cho 1.446.130 lt ngi. Thng tin chi tit cc ca mc mi nh sau: Thi Bnh (1 ca) Ca bnh 4942: nam, 84 tui, a ch ti huyn Kin Xng, tnh Thi Bnh; l F1 ca BN3750, c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. Bc Ninh (3 ca) Ca bnh 4943-4945: l cc trng hp F1 c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 20 v 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. in Bin (1 ca) Ca bnh 4946: n, 30 tui, a ch ti huyn Nm P, tnh in Bin; l F1 ca BN3997, c cch ly t trc. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 21-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. Hin ang c cch ly, iu tr ti Bnh vin d chin in Bin Ph. Hi Dng (4 ca) Ca bnh 4947-495: l cc trng hp F1, c cch ly. Kt qu xt nghim ngy 18-5 dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. Bc Giang (11 ca) Ca bnh 4951-4961: gsadasdsad v 1 ca trong khu phong ta. Kt qu xt nghim dng tnh vi SARS-CoV-2. Trc , ngy 21-5, cc gio s u ngnh hi sc tch cc v truyn nhim hi chn v 21 ca bnh c bin chuyn nng, ng ch trong c mt s bnh nhn di 40 tui v c c ph n ang mang thai. Ring ti Bc Ninh c trn 60 bnh nhn c triu chng. Sng 22-5: 20 ca COVID-19 mi, cc gio s hi chn 21 ca nng - nh 1.
